level.heading: POWER TO ADMINISTER OATHS AND TAKE TESTIMONY[COLON] SUBPOENA POWER (ยง 30-405)

level.text: In accordance with D.C. Official Code ยง3-1508, the Board, any subcommittee, Executive Director or hearing examiner authorized to conduct any inquiry, investigation, or hearing, shall have the power to administer oaths, to take testimony under oath, subpoena witnesses and require production of records, papers, and documents relevant to the inquiry.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to December 29, 1989, the D.C. Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2210 (May 28, 1992).
